outputs.output_descr:
Balanced regional development integration is crucial for Syrian economic reform and ranks high on government's agenda. The project will contribute towards better development of the eastern region in the country.
A regional economic development Program will have been formulated , major constrains identified and improvement have been made in the following domains : (1) Governance, decentralization and administrative reform (2) regulatory reform and business promotion (3) Financial sector reform and resource mobilization (4) Tourism sector (5) Regional strategic development planning ,and (6) Trade, transport and customs facilities . Capacity building for local administrators, managers and planners to analyze policy and implement suggested new regulations and modalities, and modalities will have been strengthened.
